title: Penny Juice
content: You will redesign an existing website (at least 5 pages including the homepage), chosen from the list available below. You should begin with the content of the current website as a foundation, but you can completely rethink the design and the way that the content and navigation is organized and structured. I decided to go with Penny Juice, an american company that selling fruit juice to children.

title: DDSA
content: The Digital Design Student Association (DDSA) is a club for design students made by design students. It is a club that started by my classmates after they realized there was a lack of design awareness and events that educated students on the design culture and the industry in the college.
